Seorang kakek, Iber Djamal (80 tahun), bagian dari sebuah masyarakat adat di tengah Kalimantan, menggunakan sisa hidupnya untuk meyelamatkan hutan adat terakhir di desanya. 

Pulau Barasak merupakan kawasan hutan terakhir di Desa Pilang, Kalimantan Tengah, setelah yang lainnya mengalami kebakaran dan diprivatisasi beberapa perusahaan. Iber mencoba menempuh jalan legal terbaik untuk melindungi hutan dengan berupaya mendapatkan sertifikat hutan adat yang sah untuk sisa hutan di wilayahnya. Tapi keluarga dan masyarakat desanya pikir, ia terlalu tua untuk melawan.

An interesting discussion with @ridwankamil  at the IdeaFest 2021 conference, give us another Xcitement.

"The COVID-19 crisis teaches us who can adapt is the one who can survive." A sentence that makes us realize that we have to keep moving.

Ridwan Kamil says he likes to improve public spaces, he wants to provide more open spaces so people can enjoy outdoor activity and work more creatively.

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

We are delighted to have had such an amazing discussion with @kevinkwanbooks. He talked a lot about his journey in making his book. We are so grateful for our partner @bukugpu to invite him here.

"Everyone can write, it just takes time and determination. When you are ready then you must do, luck and timing is important." That's what he thought.

He believes, Asian works are starting to dominate. Even, we still have a long way to go, but now many Asian actors, actresses, singers and even comedians are improving.

It's incredible that we're slowly bringing in a new era for Asia's future. We need many works that can bring Asia to the world. Keep in mind, everything is like a challenge, so there are many things we can do. Face the unXpected and find your future of X.

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

Being privileged is not always fun, there is a burden to be borne there. @putri_tanjung's father always encouraged her to start her own business without any help. She is well aware that the privilege she has should be used wisely.

She wishes to continue work and contribute for many people. So, while most people believe that privilege is something extraordinary, but in fact it is not only for ourselves but also for others. Thank you for coming at IdeaFest conference @putri_tanjung and we are very grateful @idelaju for helping us make this unforgetable conference session.

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

Work-life balance is a hard state to reach, and the majority of us might feel burned out. In this session, @hanamadness explains us how to face it.

"Self-reflection is very important when we are burned out, it's time to look back when we faced difficult times. Make it an encouragement to be better. Keep in mind that the situation is not good, it's only temporary and it will be better in the future if we can get through it!"

Feeling burned out is normal, but we have to control how we react to it! 

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

*the woman was too stunned to speak* ngga nyangka lho, sabtu kemarin aku bisa #literally dikasih panggung. 

di sofa orange itu, aku berkesempatan sharing pengalaman, tips, dan cerita. di sofa orange itu, tempat dimana @therealdisastr duduk and sharing juga sehari sebelumnya #lho

di moment itu, aku mewakili jutaan tiktok creators indo hebat buat sharing pengalaman storytellingku & membuat engaging brand videos di aplikasi tsb. 

kalo dipikir-pikir (tepatnya moment sebelum aku naik panggung), it hit me, ini beneran honor sih. 

bukan karena aku jd ngerasa yg terbaik, karena justru masih banyak yg lain yg lebih jago dari aku. jadi hopefully, i did yâ€™all justice on stage!

buat yg miss panelnya, intinya adalah storytelling is powerful and itâ€™s even more so on tiktok. both are great tools, so you them wisely~

anyway, dari yang awalnya iseng bikin video trending, sampe nemu niche sendiri, dan akhirnya bisa jadi panel di @ideafestid. semuanya mulai dari satu aplikasi yang ajaib ini

buat #besties yg dapet kesempatan baik, mau kamu takut, pusing, ngga PD, atau anxious, menurut aku sih bilang aja iya dulu. ini sih value yg aku pegang sejak aku kuliah. jalanin aja, kan gatau nanti apa yg bisa dateng (dari pada nyesel!!)

huge huge thanks to @celinahidajat for inviting me and @megabalqizs for moderating the panel discussion, semoga bisa sharing-sharing lagi soon!!!ðŸ’™âœ¨

In IdeaFest 2021's conference session "The Future of Series Business in Indonesia" new hopes for Indonesian series industry were widely discussed.

To improve the quality of the Indonesian series, collaboration is highly needed. We must strive to be better, starting with good storytelling through cinematic; now, Indonesian series are approaching a good quality as good as the quality of big-screen films.

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

On 27 November, Lenny Susanti (Brand Partnership Lead, TikTok) alongside Arindam Bhattacharyya (Chief Strategy Officer Dentsu), Alicia Serena (Content Creator at TikTok) and Mega Balqizs (Agency Partnership Lead, TikTok) share their insights about â€˜Storytelling With The TikTok Communityâ€™ in their IdeaTalks session.

In this session from TikTok, Lenny told us that there are some ways for us to embrace creative management on TikTok, especially for brands that are just starting to explore the platform:
1. You can collaborate with creators
2. Amplify existing conversation about your brand
3. Find your voice to fully become a member of the community
Lenny also highlighted many advantages that TikTok offered creators to express their stories & feelings toward content creation. Such an insightful session!

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

Whatever you want to do in #TheFutureofX, health is an integral part to make sure you can make them happen.Â 

@artikasaridevi, Vera Galuh Sugijanto, and I discussed how health is the most important investment that we can make.Â 

Not just to ensure that our future generations will have the best quality of life since their first 1.000 days, but also to ensure that we will still be able to have a sound body and mind once we aged.

A healthy lifestyle, according to Vera, is one of the best legacy that we can give to our children.

Whatâ€™s your Xperience in managing your physical and mental health?

Thank you, @ideafestid for trusting me to moderate again this year!

The IdeaFest's Rewind will available at jagat.live start from 30 November - 30 December 2021.

Remember, the future belongs to those who never quit.

We are so Xcitied because at #IdeaFest2021, @disney  give us another Xcitement. They share a lot of amazing stories from Encanto's behind-the-scenes.

Through, Encanto Disney wants to deliver a deep message, "How well we do for our family, and we hope people can see the situation around them, and trying to know more about their family, and try to understand every people more deeply."

This is very relevant to the situation we are currently in, as well as every crew involved in the creation of Encanto. It never occurred to them that they could make a film solely relying on technology. Collaboration from various countries, from sharing ideas, production process until this amazing films released. Thank you so much Disney!

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

Buat yang ketinggalan belum nonton, geser videonya ya buat liat kutipan dari kedua sesi tersebut!

For almost two years, the pandemic had brought many changes to our daily life. Everything is now digitalized which shifts the behavior of each of us. Business owners should redesign the strategy on how they will run their business so that they could adapt, especially towards retails 

In this session, Veri Y. Setiady (CEO & Founder of Blveprint Destinations) alongside Natalia Kusumo (CEO Hotels & Malls Amantara - Agung Sedayu Group) will teach us about how we rethink the lifestyle of retail concepts. This session is the one you might not want to miss! So, secure your IdeaFest ticket(s) only at www.ideafest.id!

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureOfX

#TheFutureofX is ever-changing, and itâ€™s reshaping every industry along with it. Including tourism, an industry that is grappling with changes wrought by pandemic.

In the session, presented by @kemenparekraf.ri, @kelly_tandiono discussed the emergence of sport tourism with Dessy Ruhati. While it has long been potentially lucrative, it is only lately that it became a new trend. Since then, the government has poured efforts to advertise it in a holistic way. Ensuring that it would become a gateway for the sport tourists to discover whole new sides and Xperiences in Indonesia. However, she also emphasizes the importance of taking measures to protect the environment from exploitation.

What are the opportunities youâ€™ve discovered in these unXpected times?

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

We're sure you know 'Kadet 1947' movie that just released! 

In this session with Rahabi Mandra and Celerina Judisari, two important people that plays a crucial part on making this movie, they are discussing the values that they want to show in the movie.

@kadet1947 movie is Xtraordinary, and unlike anything else. Go watch it now before it's too late! This movie is showing at cinema!

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

Finding our own voice is important if you want to be heard in #TheFutureofX. And as one of the loudest and most recognizable voice in Badminton, BadminTalk is the right one to learn from.

In the session presented by @indomie , Virgiawan Alfianto talked about how BadminTalk became a community that amplified the sports and the heroes in a global stage. More than just celebrating established athletes, BadminTalk also believes in becoming a platform that highlights the new and upcoming talents in Badminton. As an alternative media, BadminTalk believes in highlighting aspects of badminton that canâ€™t be seen in television while keeping a positive vibe for everyone involved.

Has these two days inspired you to find your voice?
